      static java.lang.Boolean checkForCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerId)
      Checks appointments table in database for any appointments that are currently entered for a customer
      static void checkForUpcomingAppts()
      Checks currently logged in user's ID and uses that to search through appointments in the database for any matching appointments starting within 15 minutes of user's local time, then produces alert to notify
      static void deleteAppt​(java.lang.String apptId, java.lang.String apptType)
      Deletes appointment from appointments table in database that has same appointment ID as parameter
      static void deleteCustomer​(java.lang.String customerId)
      uses checkForCustomerAppointments to validate customer selection; if open appointments exist, returns error; if no open appointments, deletes customer from customers table in database
      static boolean doesItOverlapAnyExistingApptButItself​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.Integer customerId, java.lang.Integer apptId)
      Checks start and end of appointment against others in database with same customer id; includes selected appointment id in order to allow itself to be overwritten if some parameters change (customer, date, etc)
      static boolean doesItOverlapCustomersOtherAppointments​(java.time.LocalDateTime start, java.time.LocalDateTime end, java.lang.Integer customerId)
      receives start and end of a suggested appointment and checks to see if that overlaps any other appointments for the same customer
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Gets all appointments from the database appointments table and converts them to the user's local timezone before returning them as an observable list of Appointments
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getApptTimes()
      Generates a list of all appointment times available and returns it as an obserable list of Strings
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getContacts()
      Gets all contacts' IDs from the contacts table in database and returns them as an observable list of Strings
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getCountriesList()
      helper function for easy combo box population
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getCustomersList()
      Gets all customers' IDs from the customers table in database and returns them as an observable list of Strings
      static java.lang.Integer getFirstLevelDivisionId​(java.lang.String firstLevelDivisionName)
      takes the name of a first level division/state/province and returns the first level division ID from the first_level_divisions table in the database as an integer
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> getFirstLevelDivisionsByCountry​(java.lang.String countryName)
      filters/produces the first level divisions list for a given country name
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getFirstLevelDivisionsList()

      • loginAttempt

        public static boolean loginAttempt​(java.lang.String username,
                                   java.lang.String password)
        Takes username and password and checks them against the database for a matching record
        Parameters:
        username - username for attempted login
        password - password for attempted login
        Returns:
        true if matching record exists in database; false if not

      • checkForUpcomingAppts

        public static void checkForUpcomingAppts()
        Checks currently logged in user's ID and uses that to search through appointments in the database for any matching appointments starting within 15 minutes of user's local time, then produces alert to notify

      • doesItOverlapAnyExistingApptButItself

        public static boolean doesItOverlapAnyExistingApptButItself​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                            java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                                            java.lang.Integer customerId,
                                                            java.lang.Integer apptId)
        Checks start and end of appointment against others in database with same customer id; includes selected appointment id in order to allow itself to be overwritten if some parameters change (customer, date, etc)
        Parameters:
        start - start time of appointment as LocalDateTime object
        end - end time of appointment as LocalDateTime object
        customerId - customer ID as integer
        apptId - appointment ID as integer
        Returns:
        true if the appointment data input overlaps an already existing appointment (that's not itself); false if it doesn't overlap any other appointments (but itself)

      • doesItOverlapCustomersOtherAppointments

        public static boolean doesItOverlapCustomersOtherAppointments​(java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                                                              java.time.LocalDateTime end,
                                                              java.lang.Integer customerId)
                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        receives start and end of a suggested appointment and checks to see if that overlaps any other appointments for the same customer
        Parameters:
        start - LocalDateTime object to indicate start date/time of desired appointment
        end - LocalDateTime object to indicate end date/time of desired appointment
        customerId - customer ID as integer
        Returns:
        true if overlap exists for another appointment with the same customer; false if the appointment start/end don't overlap any other appointment for this customer
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws error if unable to get results from database

      • checkForCustomerAppointments

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkForCustomerAppointments​(java.lang.String customerId)
        Checks appointments table in database for any appointments that are currently entered for a customer
        Parameters:
        customerId - - a string containing the customer's ID #
        Returns:
        true if customer has open appointments; false if no open appointments in database currently

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(java.lang.String customerId)
        uses checkForCustomerAppointments to validate customer selection; if open appointments exist, returns error; if no open appointments, deletes customer from customers table in database
        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID as string

      • updateCustomer

        public static void updateCustomer​(java.lang.String customerId,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String address,
                                  java.lang.String zip,
                                  java.lang.String phone,
                                  java.lang.Integer firstLevelDivisionId,
                                  java.lang.Integer userId)
        Takes input and updates database record of matching customer ID
        Parameters:
        customerId - customer ID as string
        name - customer's name as string
        address - customer's street address as string
        zip - customer's postal code as string
        phone - customer's phone # as string
        firstLevelDivisionId - the Integer of the id pertaining to the state/province the customer lives in
        userId - the integer of the id of the currently logged in user

      • addCustomer

        public static void addCustomer​(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.String address,
                               java.lang.String zip,
                               java.lang.String phone,
                               java.lang.Integer firstLevelDivisionId,
                               java.lang.Integer userId)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes customer creation parameters and creates next increment customer id and record for customers table in database
        Parameters:
        name - customer's name as string
        address - customer's street address as string
        zip - customer's postal code as string
        phone - customer's phone # as string
        firstLevelDivisionId - the Integer of the id pertaining to the state/province the customer lives in
        userId - the integer of the id of the currently logged in user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws error if unable to add record to database

                              java.lang.String apptType)
        Deletes appointment from appointments table in database that has same appointment ID as parameter
        Parameters:
        apptId - appointment ID as string
        apptType - appointment type as a string; for more info in functionality

      • updateAppointment

        public static void updateAppointment​(java.lang.String appointmentId,
                                     java.lang.String title,
                                     java.lang.String type,
                                     java.lang.String location,
                                     java.lang.String description,
                                     java.lang.Integer contactId,
                                     java.lang.Integer customerId,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime apptStart,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime apptEnd,
                                     java.lang.Integer userId)
        Takes input and updates database record of matching appointment ID
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - appointment ID as string
        title - appointment title as string
        type - appointment type as string
        location - appointment location as string
        description - description of appointment as string
        contactId - contact ID assigned to appointment, as Integer
        customerId - customer ID assigned to appointment, as Integer
        apptStart - LocalDateTime object of the date/time of appointment start
        apptEnd - LocalDateTime object of the date/time of appointment end
        userId - the integer of the id of the currently logged in user

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String title,
                                  java.lang.String type,
                                  java.lang.String location,
                                  java.lang.String description,
                                  java.lang.Integer contactId,
                                  java.lang.Integer customerId,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime apptStart,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime apptEnd,
                                  java.lang.Integer userId)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Takes appointment creation parameters and creates next increment appointment id and record for id on appointments table in database
        Parameters:
        title - appointment title as string
        type - appointment type as string
        location - appointment location as string
        description - description of appointment as string
        contactId - contact ID assigned to appointment, as Integer
        customerId - customer ID assigned to appointment, as Integer
        apptStart - LocalDateTime object of the date/time of appointment start
        apptEnd - LocalDateTime object of the date/time of appointment end
        userId - the integer of the id of the currently logged in user
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws error if unable to add record to the database

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getFirstLevelDivisionsList()
        helper function for easy combo box population
        Returns:
        a list of first level division names that exist in the first_level_divisions table of the database

      • getCountriesList

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> getCountriesList()
        helper function for easy combo box population
        Returns:
        a list of country names that exist in the countries table of the database

      • getFirstLevelDivisionsByCountry

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<FirstLevelDivision> getFirstLevelDivisionsByCountry​(java.lang.String countryName)
                                                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        filters/produces the first level divisions list for a given country name
        Parameters:
        countryName - name of country you're looking to produce a corresponding first level divisions list for
        Returns:
        a list of first level division objects that match the country ID of the name given in the database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws error if unable to get results from database

      • getFirstLevelDivisionId

        public static java.lang.Integer getFirstLevelDivisionId​(java.lang.String firstLevelDivisionName)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        takes the name of a first level division/state/province and returns the first level division ID from the first_level_divisions table in the database as an integer
        Parameters:
        firstLevelDivisionName - name of first Level division that you want to get the ID for
        Returns:
        the integer ID of the first level division name given
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - throws error if unable to get results from database

        Gets all customers' IDs from the customers table in database and returns them as an observable list of Strings
        Returns:
        an observable list of customer IDs to populate a combobox easily with

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
        Gets all appointments from the database appointments table and converts them to the user's local timezone before returning them as an observable list of Appointments
        Returns:
        an observable list of appointments from the database that are converted to the user's local timezone
